audio_sync_group_is_playing: This function can be used to check if any audio in a synchronised group is playing. You are required to supply the sync group ID as returned by the function audio_create_sync_group().
NOTE: This functionality is not available for the HTML5 target platform.
The above code checks to see if the sync group <tt>group_one</tt> is currently playing and if it is, the group is stopped.
